TopicTitle: Has anyone got a terrain texture pack for AVP?

Articles.Content:
I'm currently using AstronomersVisualPack for atmosphere/clouds but i'm unable to find a terrain texture pack that works alongside it. I've tried KSRP (including removing atmosphere/city lights configs) with Kopernicus and also tried SVT but both seem to overwrite my AVP atmosphere/cloud settings and add their own. Does anyone know a fix or if there's any other terrain pack that would work with it?

Edit - I have already posted this problem in the AVP thread however no one has answered so I thought i'd post it here

Edited February 23, 2019 by Louis93
